page.title: 01Birchwood - New Town
page.content: Our block mainly covers the area of Warrington New Town called Birchwood Forest Park,the Science Park and a a large area of drained mossland used for farming and a nature reserve. The three villages, Locking Stumps, Oakwood and Gorse Covert are built in the park.Extensive,careful landscaping has extended the park to border the roads and walkways.Oakwood and the Science Park have been built on the site of a World War 2 ordnance factory site.Two of the original concrete bunkers remain.It is planned to convert one of them into a military museum.Risley Moss Nature Reserve and Forest Park have full ranger services. The Industrial areas have modern factories mainly manufacturing products for the new technological age.
